title: Bug 20249[Help] Change editor/view/perspective F1 help
OB: Currently, pressing F1 when the change editor menu is open displays some help. However, the help window closes immediately, making it difficult for the user to read the contents.
EB: If there is no F1 help defined for the change editor, viewer, and perspective menus, pressing F1 should not display anything to prevent flashing. Additionally, the actions under Window > Keyboard Shortcuts should have clear F1 help defined to describe their functionality.
SR: The help window for the change editor menu should stay open when F1 is pressed, allowing the user to read the help contents. If F1 help is intended for the change editor menu, it should be clearly displayed and readable.
